document.full_text: most ohio voters do not like how governor john kasich is doing his job, including his push to limit collective bargaining for public workers, according to a poll released wednesday.
document.title: ohio voters dislike kasich's union, budget plans: poll
lines_and_colors: most ohio voters do not like how governor john kasich is doing his job, including his push to limit collective bargaining for public workers, according to a poll released wednesday.
